---
title: "Download DADA2"
---

## Binaries

Binaries are available through [Bioconductor](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/dada2.html).

```S
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("dada2", version = "3.8")
```

See the [Bioconductor install instructions](https://www.bioconductor.org/install/) if issues arise. In particular, to get the newest release of dada2 through Bioconductor you will need to have the current version of R installed.

## Source

* Current Release [(1.10)](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/releases): [Zipped](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/v1.10.zip) or [tarball](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/v1.10.tar.gz).

* Development Branch [(1.11)](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2): [Zipped](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/master.zip) or [tarball](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/master.tar.gz).

* Previous Release [(1.8)](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/releases): [Zipped](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/v1.8.zip) or [tarball](https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/archive/v1.8.tar.gz).
